body_html:
So I went back and looked at what I was doing on the recipe details page and on further thought I think this logic is actually clean enough that it doesn't need another selector or a "container":

    const recipeId = getUrlParamAsInt(state, 'recipeId');
    const latestRevisionId = getLatestRevisionIdForRecipe(state, recipeId, '');
    const revisionId = getUrlParam(state, 'revisionId', latestRevisionId);
    const revision = getRevision(state, revisionId, new Map());
    const isLatestRevision = isLatestRevision(state, revisionId);
